The easiest and fastest way to connect with teammates, mentors, and hackathon organizers globally, ensuring seamless communication and team management.

Benefits

AI-Powered Insights for Smarter Talent Management

Leverage AI-driven analytics to track student performance, identify top talent, and enhance placements with data-backed decisions.

01

Comprehensive Student Performance Tracking

Monitor students’ coding progress across multiple platforms in real-time with automated leaderboards and in-depth analytics
02

Industry-Ready Talent Identification

Easily identify top-performing students and refer them to leading companies, enhancing placement rates & reputation.
03

Boost Institutional Recognition

Showcase your institute’s top performers and achievements, attracting better opportunities and partnerships.
04

Personalized Dashboards for Students

Provide students with easy access to coding resources, performance tracking, and contest updates in one place.

Features

What Makes Us Different

Empowering students and institutes with AI-driven insights, real-time tracking, and automated placement solutions.

AI-Powered Skill & Performance Analytics

Advanced AI-driven algorithms analyze coding patterns, problem-solving efficiency, and language proficiency to provide deep insights into student capabilities.

Real-Time Coding Progress Dashboard

A personalized dashboard aggregates coding stats, submissions, accuracy rates, and rankings, giving students & institutes a comprehensive coding portfolio.

Automated Hackathon & Contest Aggregation

Students get access to multiple coding contests, hackathons, and challenges from leading platforms—all in one place, ensuring continuous competitive learning.

Smart Referral & Placement System

Crevozone enables institutes to identify top performers and directly refer them to companies, backed by data-driven performance metrics.

AI-Powered Student Performance Analytics

Get real-time, data-driven insights into student performance, coding efficiency, and progress across multiple platforms like LeetCode, CodeChef, and HackerRank.

Placement-Ready Talent Identification

Identify top-performing students using AI-driven metrics and directly connect them with hiring companies, boosting placement rates.
